thread.section_title: Hotel 2000 Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Absolutely Lovely !
thread.title_full: Absolutely Lovely ! - Review of Hotel 2000 Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Jacqueline B
title: Absolutely Lovely !
text:
We enjoyed a lovely 3 night stay in this hotel in sept 2016. As mentioned, it doesn't look like a hotel from the outside but what a beautiful building inside. Our room was lovely and very comfortable. Spotless everywhere thanks to the amazing cleaners.
The concierges were helpful and friendly.
Great close to all major sights and some fantastic restaurants closeby.
